eu_initiatives:
Energy initiatives, policies and legislation.  
 
In particular nuclear fission energy related issues - safety, security, future nuclear generation technologies.  
 
The Association is monitoring especially initiatives of the DG RTD (Euratom), DG Energy, DG JRC and EIB.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
Policy implementation is done through regular interactions with European Commission.  
 
Public relations are done via website, newsletters and specific events - www.nugenia.org, www.nugeniaforum2017.com, etc.  
 
Highlighted project that supported NUGENIA is NUGENIA_Plus (FP7 Euratom project)
goals__remit:
NUGENIA is set up to be the starting point of a more ambitious and united community to advance the safe, reliable and efficient operation of nuclear power plants. NUGENIA provides, in a transparent and visible way, a scientific and technical basis by initiating and supporting international R&D projects and programmes. NUGENIA contributes to innovation and facilitates the implementation and dissemination of R&D results. 
 
The Association being an independent legal entity is open to all nuclear stakeholders endorsing the Statutes. All members of SNETP are welcome as are international and non-European organisations.
